start.welcome: 👋 Welcome to Claude Code Telegram Bot, {name}!
start.description: 🤖 I help you access Claude Code remotely through Telegram.
start.quick_start_2: Use `/cd <project>` to navigate to a project
start.quick_start_3: Send any message to start coding with Claude!
start.security_note: 🔒 Your access is secured and all actions are logged.
start.usage_note: 📊 Use `/status` to check your usage limits.

img.instructions:
📸 **Image Processing with Claude**

🖼️ **Send images** for analysis:
• Code screenshots
• Diagrams and schemas
• UI/UX designs
• Charts and tables

📝 **Add instructions** (optional):
• Describe what to analyze
• Ask specific questions
• Request explanations

⚡ **Commands:**
• `done` - start analysis
• `cancel` - end session
• `fix` - bug fixing mode

💡 **Examples:**
• "Analyze this code for errors"
• "Explain this diagram"
• "How to improve this interface?"
img.session_expired:
⏰ **Session Expired**

Time limit reached. Start a new session with `/img`.
img.image_received:
✅ **Image Received** ({count}/{max})

📝 Send instructions or more images.
💡 Type `done` to start analysis.
img.no_images:
❌ **No Images**

Please send images for analysis first.
img.cancelled:
❌ **Analysis Cancelled**

Session ended. Use `/img` for a new session.
img.fix_mode_activated:
🔧 **Fix Mode Activated**

Claude will focus on finding and fixing code errors.
img.instruction_updated:
📝 **Instructions Updated**

Current images: {count}. Send `done` to analyze or continue uploading.
img.processing:
🤖 **Analyzing images with Claude...**

Please wait. This may take a few minutes.

help.title: 🤖 **Claude Code Telegram Bot Help**
help.commands:
Available commands:
/status - Status
/new - New session
/actions - Actions
/restart - Restart bot

restart.title: 🔄 **Bot Restart**
restart.description: Restart the bot with memory cleanup and code updates
restart.restarting:
🔄 **Restarting bot...**

Stopping all processes and starting fresh...
restart.access_denied: 🚫 You don't have permission to restart the bot.
restart.script_not_found:
❌ **Restart script not found**

Please restart manually.

main_menu.title: Main Menu
main_menu.description: Main bot functions for working with Claude Code.

dracon.title: 🔧 DRACON-YAML Bot Logic Modeling
dracon.description: Model bot logic using YAML schemas with graph analysis
dracon.help: DRACON (Дружелюбные Русские Алгоритмы, Которые Обеспечивают Надежность) system for bot logic modeling

refactor.title: 🔄 DRACON Refactoring System
refactor.description: Reverse engineer existing bot code into DRACON schemas
refactor.access_denied: ❌ Access denied. Refactoring available only to administrators

img.title: 📸 Image Processing
img.instructions:
📸 **Image Processing Mode**

Please send your images (up to {max_images} files). You can send them one by one or all at once.

**Supported formats:** PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, WebP
**Max file size:** {max_size}MB per image

After uploading, type your instructions or 'done' to process.

Type 'cancel' to stop.
img.session_expired: ❌ Image session has expired. Use /img to start a new session.
img.image_received: ✅ Image {current}/{max} received. Send more images or type 'done' to process.
img.no_images: ❌ No images uploaded yet. Please send images first.
img.instruction_updated: 📝 Instruction updated. Current images: {count}. Send 'done' to process or continue uploading images.

status.title: 📊 **Session Status**
status.usage_info: You have used {used}/{limit} credits this session

help.title: ❓ Help
help.commands:
**Navigation Commands:**
• `/ls` - List files and directories
• `/cd <directory>` - Change to directory
• `/pwd` - Show current directory
• `/projects` - Show available projects

**Session Commands:**
• `/new` - Start new Claude session
• `/status` - Show session status

**DRACON System (Visual Modeling):**
• `/dracon help` - DRACON help
• `/dracon diagram <category> <file>` - 🎨 Visual diagram
• `/dracon list [category]` - List schemas
• `/dracon analyze <yaml>` - Analyze schema
• `/refactor` - Reverse engineer code to DRACON

**Special Commands:**
• `/actions` - Show quick actions
• `/git` - Git repository commands
• `/claude` - Authorize Claude CLI
• `/img` - Image processing with Claude

**MCP Commands:**
• `/mcpadd` - Add MCP server
• `/mcplist` - List MCP servers
• `/mcpselect` - Select active context
• `/mcpask` - Query with MCP context
• `/mcpremove` - Remove MCP server
• `/mcpstatus` - MCP system status

**Scheduler:**
• `/schedules` - Task management
• `/add_schedule` - Add new task

**System Commands:**
• `/restart` - Restart bot

**Tips:**
• Send text files for viewing
• Use specific queries
• Check status with `/status`

idle.title: 🕒 Idle Session
idle.message:
Your Claude session has been idle for {timeout_minutes} minutes.

Would you like to continue working or close the session?

errors.unexpected_error: ❌ An unexpected error occurred. Try again later.

git.title: 🔧 **Git Management**
git.description: Essential Git operations for your project:

help.title: 📖 **Git Commands - Help**

operations.status: **📊 Status** - shows file and repository state
operations.commit: **💾 Commit** - creates a saved point of changes
operations.log: **📜 Log** - shows history of saved changes
operations.diff: **🔍 Diff** - compares files and shows differences

help.note: All operations are executed through Claude CLI for maximum flexibility.
